team.title: Founder Director
team.name: Fabrizio Giordanino
team.bioHtml: A product strategy leader for fintech and blockchain companies, helping designing and validating disruptive business models and making business investable.

jobs.title: CTO/Tech Lead
jobs.description:
For this role, the ideal individual will be both hands on and able to lead the team from the front. Your responsibilities will range from managing and expanding the development team to having free-reign on the tech. 

Experience:

Proven  experience Managing tech teams
Previous experience in a tech startup, ideally FinTech
Relevant experience in leading teams of Developers, DevOps, Product, etc
Experience in a hands-on role, i.e. Backend Developer.
